Author: bugspraycody522
Text: i feel this deep in my soul.... being in a grocery/convenience store when fasting is such a fucking trip; it's like i forget whatever thing i came in there to do and just tunnel vision in on food im not going to eat. picking it up, putting it back, picking something else up, feeling dizzy, looking like a total lunatic to everyone around me........ good times. great times.
